title: Drawing, "Sketches of Sky with Clouds, Clouds, and a Seated Girl and Man Seen From the Back, Jamaica", possibly 1865
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink at upper right: Lugt 457d
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite with figures at various locations, and from left to right throughout:  dazzling / green / grey / gold / dark purple / cloud / coolish purple / warmer / greenish masses / soft warm (....?) / Delicious hazy / reflected ridges / greenish mangoes with / green tops; and again at bottom in opposite direction with numbers in various locations and: green sky / golden blue / red orange glow; and at bottom right: 3 warm / mottled / 4 open / sky dusty.

Verso:  Inscribed in graphite at various locations at top left:  watermelon / light / warm grey / rich orange / warm grey with yel / more purple / reddish glow.
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view showing a cloudy sky over mountain ranges and at bottom, drawn in the opposite direction, a sky with clouds.

Verso: Sky with clouds at upper left, more clouds at bottom left, and a seated girl an a seated man shown from the back, with the head of a girl outlined beside at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches of Sky with Clouds, Clouds, and a Seated Girl and Man Seen From the Back, Jamaica", possibly 1865.
possibly 1865. Graphite on greenish paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1267.
